name: gryphon-mount
description: Core Software for Gryphon Mount Games
author: Denny S. Temple (https://dentemple.com/)

scripts.build: npm run bootstrap && lerna run --stream build
scripts.start: npm run build && lerna run --parallel --no-bail start
scripts.audit: npm audit fix && lerna run --stream --no-bail audit && npm run bootstrap
scripts.update: ncu -u && lerna run --stream --no-bail update && npm run bootstrap
scripts.update:check: ncu && npm i && lerna run --stream --no-bail update:check
